DDSOURCEACCESS(8) System Manager's Manual DDSOURCEACCESS(8)

NAME

DataDetectorsSourceAccess — DataDetectors sources utility

SYNOPSIS

DataDetectorsSourceAccess

DESCRIPTION

The DataDetectorsSourceAccess command manages and controls access to the content of dynamic sources for the DataDetectors clients.

This tool should not be run directly.

EXIT STATUS

DataDetectorsSourceAccess will exit on SIGTERM with status 0, or >0 if an error occurred.

16 June 2016 macOS
